attributes.additional_details: This petition calls on the government to apply the same 18 week waiting time for treatment for mental illnesses as applies to physical illnesses. At present, people can wait for over a year or be told there is no service for their problem. This discriminatory practice must stop and funding should be agreed to ensure equity between physical and mental health services.

rejection.details: Please see: Commit to a deadline for when mental health problems will see a maximum timeframe for treatment enforced.
